summary: OBIS Stuff - merged in Mask Fix and also a faction patch if you use LAL
descriptionHtml:
[left][color=#ff7700]This File is now obsolete - I'll be taking it down soon.
The OBIS page will now have the files from here.
Thank you and [/color]Long Live OBIS!!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/31264-1-1380749285.png[/img]




[/left][b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Comments are disabled on this page! Please go to the OBIS page and post there... Thank you![/size][/font][/b]

You must have [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31264/?]OBIS - Organized Bandits In Skyrim[/url] Installed for this file to do anything - go there and download Main file.

This file contains two ESP files...

[size=3][b]OBISDB.esp[/b][/size] - this file has the Face Mask fix merged into the Dragonborn plugin for OBIS - Install this and overwrite.
You'll no longer need the OBISDB-FaceMaskFix.esp.

[b][size=3]OBIS DG Faction Patch.esp[/size][/b] - is a patch to correct a faction issue if you use Live Another Life mod and pick the Outlaw In The Wilds start - this will fix the bandit being hostile to you and other bandits. - I recommend merging this file into your other patches - it's a simple change. It requires Dawnguard as a master.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31264/?]OBIS - Organized Bandits In Skyrim[/url] was made by Indigoblade - this file is provided to support him and his mod.

German Version available at [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60585/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60585/?[/url] - Thanks to ww13

Thank you - Enjoy!
-Jebbalon
author: Jebbalon
